carbon.widget

Interface AutoSizeTextView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AutoCompleteEditText, Button, CheckBox, CheckedTextView, DropDown, EditText, MarshmallowEditText, RadioButton, SearchEditText, TextView

    public interface AutoSizeTextView
    Interface of a text view capable of automatic text size adjusting.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Gets automatic text size granularity.

      • getAutoSizeStepGranularity

        float getAutoSizeStepGranularity()
        Gets automatic text size granularity.
        Returns:
        granularity

      • setAutoSizeStepGranularity

        void setAutoSizeStepGranularity(float autoSizeStepGranularity)
        Sets automatic text size granularity. Text can only take values which are equal to minSize * [0 to N] * granularity or maxSize. This parameter helps to keep automatic text sizes count low and easy to predict. Setting granularity to a larger value speeds up the adjustment process.
        Parameters:
        autoSizeStepGranularity - granularity
